overview:
Goal - Distribution of knowledge across all levels of society, through customized application of technology in industrial and social establishments.

  • Successful formation of startups to provide ITES services to small and medium scale industries.
  • Contribution in creating IT awareness among startups and small scale industries.
  • Mentoring to startup enthusiast and new business entrants.
  • Business consultant for existing and proposed businesses.
  • Worked on document conversion projects for Government establishments, such as municipal corporations, zonal offices, city survey department.
  • Successful establishment of Data Management Center in non-metro city, generating local employment opportunities.
  • Recruitment of eligible candidates through Government agencies such as local and central Employment Exchange.
  • Worked in US Healthcare domain for offshore process setup and management.
  • Worked on inventory control projects for domestic automobile OEM and ancillary units.
  • Worked on Six-Sigma, TPM, TQM, TS-16949, QS-9000 systems, FMEA, Lean Manufacturing for automotive ancillary units.
